Reasons for a lower probability include the longstanding post-2017 restraint, likely Chinese disapproval of a seventh test, and the regime’s ability to achieve signaling goals via missile/satellite activity without incurring the added costs of a nuclear detonation. I put extra weight on the status quo given how slowly these thresholds tend to change.
